00031 
00032 class EffectDtmf:public Effect {
00033 
00034  public:
00035    EffectDtmf() {
00036    }
00037 
00038    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00039       return wxString(_("DTMF Tones..."));
00040    }
00041 
00042    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00043      std::set<wxString> result;
00044      result.insert(wxT("http://lv2plug.in/ns/lv2core#GeneratorPlugin"));
00045      return result;
00046    }
00047 
00048    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00049       return wxString(wxT("DTMFTone"));
00050    }
00051 
00052    virtual wxString GetEffectDescription() {
00053       return wxString::Format(_("Applied effect: Generate DTMF tones, %.6lf seconds"), dtmfDuration);
00054    }
00055 
00056    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00057       return wxString(_("Generating DTMF tones"));
00058    }
00059 
00060    virtual int GetEffectFlags() {
00061       return BUILTIN_EFFECT | INSERT_EFFECT;
00062    }
00063 
00064    virtual bool PromptUser();
00065    virtual bool Process();
00066    virtual bool TransferParameters( Shuttle & shuttle );
00067 
00068  private:
00069    sampleCount numSamplesSequence, numSamplesTone, numSamplesSilence;
00070 
00071    wxString dtmfString;       // dtmf tone string
00072    int    dtmfNTones;         // total number of tones to generate
00073    double dtmfTone;           // duration of a single tone in ms
00074    double dtmfSilence;        // duration of silence between tones in ms
00075    double dtmfDuration;       // duration of the whole dtmf tone sequence in seconds
00076    double dtmfDutyCycle;      // ratio of dtmfTone/(dtmfTone+dtmfSilence)
00077    double dtmfAmplitude;      // amplitude of dtmf tone sequence, restricted to (0-1)
00078 
00079  protected:
00080    virtual bool MakeDtmfTone(float *buffer, sampleCount len, float fs,
00081                              wxChar tone, sampleCount last,
00082                              sampleCount total, float amplitude);
00083 
00084  // friendship ...
00085  friend class DtmfDialog;
00086 
00087 };

00128    double dDuration;       // duration of the whole dtmf tone sequence
00129    double dDutyCycle;      // ratio of dTone/(dTone+dSilence)
